extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: G: The Journey
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: RDC : Le Voyage

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: B1: The Approaching
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: SS1 : L'Approche

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: B2: The Arrival
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: SS2 : L'Arrivée

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: B3: The Impact
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: SS3 : L'Impact

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: B4: The Message
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: SS4 : Le Message

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Back To Lookout
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Retour au Point de Vue

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Lea, dear!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Lea, chérie !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I was just having a closer look at the elevator symbols.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je regardais un peu de plus près les symboles sur l'ascenseur.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: And then it just came over me how it all might be connected!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et il m'est soudainement venu à l'esprit comment tout pouvait être lié !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Wanna hear my theory?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Tu veux écouter ma théorie ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Alrighty!\. Let's have a look together!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: OK !\. Alors regardons ensemble !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Floor 1: "The Journey"
A meteor traveling lonely through space.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Étage 1 : "Le Voyage"
Une météorite voyage seule dans l'espace.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Floor 2: "The Approaching"!
The meteor is getting closer to a planet.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Étage 2 : "L'approche" !
Le météore se rapproche d'une planète.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Floor 3: "The Arrival"!
The meteor is about to reach the planet.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Étage 3 : "L'arrivée" !
Le météore va bientôt atteindre la planète.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Floor 4: "The Impact"!
Well... I'm sure you get the idea.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Étage 4 : "L'impact" !
Bon... J'imagine que tu as compris.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: And blank!\. I'm certain there is one more floor left.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et du vide !\. Je suis certaine qu'il y a encore un autre étage.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: So... what do you think this meteor is all about?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Donc... tu penses que c'est quoi le rapport avec cette météorite ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Say, Lea. Do you remember the \c[3]Message of the Sky\c[0]?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Dis, Lea, Est-ce que tu te souviens du \c[3]Message venu du Ciel\c[0] ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: It was mentioned in several texts of the Ancients.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Il était mentionné dans plusieurs textes des Anciens.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Di'aro wrapped it in an \c[3]envelope of rock and ice\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Di'aro l'a enveloppé dans une \c[3]enveloppe de roche et de glace\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: And \c[3]K'win\c[0] made it \c[3]approach this planet fast enough\c[0], so it arrived in time.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et \c[3]K'win\c[0] l'a fait \c[3]approcher de cette planète suffisamment rapidement\c[0], pour qu'il puisse arriver à temps.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I think this is what this meteor is!\. It's the \c[3]Message of the Sky\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je crois que cette météorite est le \c[3]Message venu du Ciel\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: And it landed right here, at this very location!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et il a atterri juste ici, là où on se trouve !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: It left a gigantic crater, the same one we're currently descending down into!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Il a laissé un cratère gigantesque, celui dans lequel on est en train de descendre !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: And I'm sure at the bottom we'll finally find out what it is!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et je suis sûr qu'en bas, on va enfin découvrir de quoi il s'agit !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: The message of the sky - the secret of the Ancients!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Le message venu du ciel, le secret des anciens !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I really can't wait!\. Let's go!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je suis vraiment trop impatiente !\. Continuons !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Awww...\. I was hoping to share it with somebody.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ohhhhh...\. J'espérais pouvoir la partager avec quelqu'un.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Yes
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oui

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: No
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Non

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Holerö!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Holerö !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: So...\. we're almost there, aren't we?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Donc...\. on y est presque, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We did the obligatory final batch of bouncing puzzles...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On a fait la série obligatoire de puzzle de rebonds...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Collected the master key...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Récupéré le sésame...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Oh Junge!\. You missed it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oh Junge !\. Tu l'as raté ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: You get it after the battle on this floor.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Tu l'obtiens après le combat sur cet étage.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: It should still be there, go pick it up!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Il devrait encore y être, va le chercher !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: So... the final boss should not be much further.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Donc... le boss final ne devrait plus être très loin.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Gyahaha!\. You seem very determined!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Gyahaha !\. Tu sembles bien décidée !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Alright then...\. this was pretty fun so far.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oui, bon...\. C'était vraiment fun jusqu'à présent.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Gotta admit, I got more into it than I initially expected.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je dois admettre que je m'amuse plus que ce que je prévoyais.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Almost made me forget that I'm now a permanent part of this game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ça me fait presque oublier que je fais partie du jeu de manière permanente.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Don't worry, I'm fine.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, je vais bien.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I mean, hey, we now have access to a whole island paradise and all that.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je veux dire, hé, on a accès à une île paradisiaque toute entière et tout.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We should capitalize on that, you know?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On devrait s'en servir, tu trouves pas ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Take a long walk along the beach together, sometime.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On pourrait faire une longue balade à la plage ensemble, un jour.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: No enemy bashing, just walking and taking in the waves and breezes.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Pas de bagarre, juste on marche, et on profite des vagues et du vent.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: What do you think?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Qu'est-ce que tu en dis ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Alright!\. It's a date!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bon !\. Alors on a un rancard !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We just have to find a time with less players around.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Il faut juste qu'on trouve un moment ou il y a moins de joueurs.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Unless you prefer walking through a war zone.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Sauf si tu préfères marcher sur un champ de bataille.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Awww.\. Not the beach walking kind, I see?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ooooh.\. Pas du genre à marcher sur la plage, je vois ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Too bad.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Dommage.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Yes
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oui

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: No
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Non

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Anyway, ready to continue with the dungeon?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: En tout cas, tu es prête à continuer le donjon ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Alright, let's go!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Allez, on reprend !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Alright!\. I'll go ahead then!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: OK !\. Je vais aller devant alors !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Yes
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oui

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: No
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Non

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Oh man, it's still not over! Does it ever end?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Hé ben mec, c'est toujours pas fini ! Ça finira un jour ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Didn't you say you like long dungeons?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: C'est pas toi qui disais que t'aimais bien les donjons à rallonge ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I guess I did... But it's still so exhausting.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ça se pourrait... Mais il est quand même épuisant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Getting too old for this, huh?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Tu deviens trop vieux pour ça, hein ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Oh, come on!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oh, aller !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I think we're getting close to the end.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je crois qu'on se rapproche de la fin.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: How'd you even know that?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Comment tu peux le savoir ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Well, just look down. We're getting close to the bottom of the crater.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Hé bien, regarde en bas. On se rapproche du fond du cratère.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I'd NEVER dare to look down and you know that!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je vais JAMAIS oser regarder en bas et tu le sais !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Right...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oui...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We're surrounded by the fog now!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On est entouré par le brouillard maintenant !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Good thing it's not poisonous.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: C'est une bonne chose qu'il soit pas empoisonné.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We can't be sure just yet...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On ne peut pas encore en être sûr...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Then let's not wait here and find out, right?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Alors ne restons pas là pour le découvrir, non ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: But it's pretty!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Mais c'est tellement joli !
